name: preact-responder-event-plugin
description: a library combine react-native-web and preact together
author: johnny

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn update-mangle && microbundle build --raw --external preact --format es --no-sourcemap
scripts.build:docs: cd docs && ls | egrep -v 'example|docs|mkdocs.yml' | xargs rm -rfv && mkdocs build && mv site/* . && rm -rf site
